text: wa-ittabaʿu ma tatlu l-shayatinu ʿala mul'ki sulaymana wama kafara sulaymanu walakinna l-shayatina kafaru yuʿallimuna l-nasa l-sih'ra wama unzila ʿala l-malakayni bibabila haruta wamaruta wama yuʿallimani min ahadin hatta yaqula innama nahnu fit'natun fala takfur fayataʿallamuna min'huma ma yufarriquna bihi bayna l-mari wazawjihi wama hum bidarrina bihi min ahadin illa bi-idh'ni l-lahi wayataʿallamuna ma yadurruhum wala yanfaʿuhum walaqad ʿalimu lamani ish'tarahu ma lahu fi l-akhirati min khalaqin walabi'sa ma sharaw bihi anfusahum law kanu yaʿlamuna
